content.heroIntro: Welcome to PROJECT 018, an exclusive residential development in Lo Fuentes, Penaguila, designed by TURIS PROMOCIONES. This carefully curated collection of contemporary villas represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca living, offering discerning buyers a rare opportunity to invest in prime Alicante real estate at 40% less than comparable Spanish island markets. Each villa features 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, and 178m² of thoughtfully designed living space set on generous 801m² plots with private landscaped gardens and swimming pools. Scheduled for completion on 01-12-2028, PROJECT 018 delivers modern construction standards, premium finishes, and a lifestyle that seamlessly blends Mediterranean charm with contemporary comfort. TURIS PROMOCIONES brings decades of development expertise to this project, ensuring quality construction and exceptional value for both owner-occupiers and investors seeking strong rental returns in one of Spain's most desirable regions.

locationSection.intro: Lo Fuentes in Penaguila is a hidden gem nestled in the heart of Alicante's interior, offering the perfect balance between peaceful countryside living and convenient access to cosmopolitan amenities. This established residential area attracts an international community of discerning expats and Spanish families seeking authenticity without compromise. The region benefits from excellent infrastructure, proximity to world-class healthcare, and direct connections to the Costa Blanca's celebrated Blue Flag beaches. Penaguila's inland location provides shelter from coastal development while maintaining the quality of life that makes this region increasingly sought-after. The established expat community means English is widely spoken, healthcare providers cater to international standards, and amenities reflect cosmopolitan expectations. Investment here represents not just a home purchase, but an entry into a thriving, well-integrated international lifestyle where property values appreciate steadily, currently trending at +8% year-on-year.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. Non-resident foreign nationals require a Spanish tax identification number (NIF) and should engage local legal representation. PROJECT 018 welcomes international buyers and our team provides comprehensive guidance through the purchase process.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect costs including transfer tax (6-8% depending on region, lower in Alicante), legal fees (approximately 1-2%), notary fees (0.5-1%), and property registration costs. Our team provides detailed cost breakdowns during the consultation process.
